Package GameParts

Class Passage

java.lang.Object
GameParts.Passage
public class Passage
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Passage within the HECCIN' Game

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String inlineComment
    the comment that's inline with the passage declaration
    private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> linkedPassages
    a set with the names of all the passages this passage is linked to
    private java.lang.String parsedContent
    the parsed version of the string content
    private java.lang.String parsedTags
    the tags for this passage, but as a string representation of an array
    private java.lang.String passageName
    the name of this passage
    private Vector2D position
    a position Vector2D.
    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags
    an arrayList of string tag names (which this passage is tagged with).
    private java.lang.String trailingComment
    A trailing multiline comment behind this passage object
    private java.lang.String unparsedContent
    raw unparsed content

      the name of this passage

    • unparsedContent

      raw unparsed content

    • trailingComment

      private java.lang.String trailingComment
      A trailing multiline comment behind this passage object

    • inlineComment

      private java.lang.String inlineComment
      the comment that's inline with the passage declaration

    • parsedContent

      private java.lang.String parsedContent
      the parsed version of the string content

    • parsedTags

      private java.lang.String parsedTags
      the tags for this passage, but as a string representation of an array

    • linkedPassages

      private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> linkedPassages
      a set with the names of all the passages this passage is linked to

    • tags

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags
      an arrayList of string tag names (which this passage is tagged with).

    • position

      private Vector2D position
      a position Vector2D. will be used with OH-HECC.

  • Constructor Details

    • Passage

      public Passage​(java.lang.String passageName, java.lang.String unparsedContent, java.lang.String comment)
      Constructs a passage object without any metadata
      Parameters:
      passageName - the name of this passage
      unparsedContent - the raw content of it
      comment - the multiline comment for the passage

    • Passage

      public Passage​(java.lang.String passageName, java.lang.String unparsedContent, java.lang.String comment, java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      Creates a Passage object with metadata
      Parameters:
      passageName - the name of this passage
      unparsedContent - the raw content of it
      comment - the multiline comment for the passage
      lineEndMetadata - the raw metadata of it

  • Method Details

    • readMetadata

      private void readMetadata​(java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      This is a wrapper function for all the metadata reading stuff
      Parameters:
      lineEndMetadata -

    • readTagMetadata

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readTagMetadata​(java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      This reads the tag metadata stuff
      Parameters:
      lineEndMetadata - The full line end metadata
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the tag metadata

    • readVectorMetadata

      private Vector2D readVectorMetadata​(java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      This reads the position Vector2D metadata
      Parameters:
      lineEndMetadata - the full line end metadata stuff
      Returns:
      A Vector2D for the OH-HECC position of this passage

    • getInlineComment

      private java.lang.String getInlineComment​(java.lang.String lineEndMetadata)
      Obtains the inline comment from the end of the line end metadata
      Parameters:
      lineEndMetadata - the line end metadata
      Returns:
      The comment of it (everything between a // and the end of the line). returns empty string if no comment is found.

    • parseContent

      public void parseContent()
      Parses the unparsedContent into parsedContent, and parses the tags into parsedTags

    • escapeHtmlCharacters

      private java.lang.String escapeHtmlCharacters​(java.lang.String input)
      Used to wrap the html character escaping stuff
      Returns:
      version of input with the escape characters escaped

    • parsePassageContent

      private java.lang.String parsePassageContent​(java.lang.String input)
      This is used to convert raw hecc passage content into some decently formatted HTML
      Parameters:
      input - the passage content to format
      Returns:
      input but with HTML formatting

    • parsePassageLinks

      private java.lang.String parsePassageLinks​(java.lang.String input, boolean convertLinks)
      Function used for parsing the passage links
      Parameters:
      input - the raw string input
      convertLinks - whether or not it should bother converting the links into hecc links or not
      Returns:
      the input string but (potentially) with the passage links converted into hecc links

    • actuallyParseThePassageLinks

      private java.lang.String actuallyParseThePassageLinks​(java.lang.String input, boolean direct, boolean converting)
      A method that does all the passage link parsing stuff
      Parameters:
      input - the input passage text to parse
      direct - whether or not it's looking for direct passage links
      converting - whether or not it's converting these links into hecc links
      Returns:
      the input passage text with the links converted into hecc links

    • convertDirectLink

      private java.lang.String convertDirectLink​(java.lang.String passageName)
      Creates a direct hecc link using the passageName as an input
      Parameters:
      passageName - the passagename for the direct link
      Returns:
      the direct link html string

    • convertIndirectLink

      private java.lang.String convertIndirectLink​(java.lang.String[] linkParts)
      creates an indirect hecc link using a string array of the link parts as an input
      Parameters:
      linkParts - [0] holds link text, [1] contains name of passage being linked
      Returns:
      the indirect link html string

    • parseTags

      private java.lang.String parseTags​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputTags)
      This parses the passage tags
      Parameters:
      inputTags - arrayList of tags to parse
      Returns:
      a string with the array representation of those tags

    • updateLinkedPassages

      public void updateLinkedPassages()
      A public method, callable by anything, that can update the linkedPassages from the unparsedContent

    • validateLinkedPassages

      public boolean validateLinkedPassages​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allPassages)
      This can be used to check if all the linked passages actually exist, returning the result as a boolean
      Parameters:
      allPassages - The set of all the declared passages
      Returns:
      true if all the passages this passage links to exist, false otherwise

    • validateLinkedPassagesThrowingException

      public void validateLinkedPassagesThrowingException​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> allPassages) throws UndefinedPassageException
      This can be used to check if all the linked passages actually exist, throwing an exception if they don't exist
      Parameters:
      allPassages - The set of all declared passages
      Throws:
      UndefinedPassageException - if one of this passage's linked passages don't actually exist

    • getHeccedRepresentation

      public java.lang.String getHeccedRepresentation()
      Gets the HECCED.js representation of this passage
      Returns:
      A string with the necessary JavaScript code to construct this passage

    • printPassageInfoForDebuggingReasons

      public void printPassageInfoForDebuggingReasons()
      This just prints the passage info, for debugging reasons.
